about_the_game:
FADE^2 - DLC for Developer Support

QueseraGames is a small indie-game development team in Korea.

We aim to build a music-interactive experience deeply related to a narrative.

FADE^2 is a tech demo game for our undergoing new project, which is to have phenomenal artworks and scenarios.
A twisted fairytale world, holding a tragic and catastrophic secret of the characters…

We would deeply appreciate your donation for our project.

This DLC includes not only some simple skin changes, but also a map on our internal test difficulty level.
Receiving a lot of feedback, we decided to change it to the current NORMAL difficulty to better match the feel of the game.
We decided to release the test map as HARD difficulty to the public as a way of thanking those who have been our supporters through the DLC.
We hope you find it a bit like a beta test!
The action is pretty fun, even if it's a little less emotional, and it fits the game's desperate music, so we think it'll be a fair challenge.
I hope you enjoy it.

Help us recover the Steam Direct Fee, or just a cup of coffee is good enough!
